Product: 304 Stainless Steel Kitchen Cooking Tongs, 9 and 12 Set of 2 Sturdy Grilling Barbeque Brushed Locking Food Tongs with Ergonomic Grip, Black
Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
Reviews: I am very pleased with the functionality of these tongs. They are clean looking, easy to store (thanks the the ingenious locking mechanism) and sturdy. If I were to make one small improvement, I would want the hollow handles filled in or covered somehow, just to prevent the possibility of any food items or condiments from getting caught and trapped in there, where it is next to impossible to clean by normal means. They are still wonderful in spite of that flaw.

Product: 304 Stainless Steel Kitchen Cooking Tongs, 9 and 12 Set of 2 Sturdy Grilling Barbeque Brushed Locking Food Tongs with Ergonomic Grip, Black
Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
Reviews: I have a pair of these tongs that I purchased in 2018, and I use them almost daily!  I saw them on sale so I decided to order a second set  These are the best tongs.  Lock and unlock easily, nice weight to them, and ver easy to clean.  I had previously purchased a set with the silicone covers on the tips, but the covers kept slipping off the tongs.  I thew them away when I got this set without the tips.  Absolutely the best value forr the money.  These tongs will outlast me!

Product: 304 Stainless Steel Kitchen Cooking Tongs, 9 and 12 Set of 2 Sturdy Grilling Barbeque Brushed Locking Food Tongs with Ergonomic Grip, Black
Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
Reviews: I’m embarrassed to tell you that I bought a second pair (1 for food, & 1 for more general household use because they’re so helpful.) I use the “food” pair to handle cooking meat, for example turning over any meats in the a slow cooker, or roast in an oven. Also used to serve salad at the table. And of course it works extremely well to pick up food & place on dishes, & I’m thinking about things that are unusual shapes and such: corn on the cob, asparagus, etc. Now, of course the tool needs to be cleaned & sanitized very carefully before using it on the next item in your recipe, especially both pork & chicken, etc.As far as non-food uses, I use them to make it easier to reach things, usually my glasses under furniture, or packaged food on the top pantry shelf. Actually, pretty much the “high shelf” in any kitchen cabinet, & maybe anywhere, requires me to use tools to reach. (I’m not even a hint taller than 5’ even.) I’ve been known to bring a pair to the grocery store.Quick recap: wonderful tool. Most recent design is genius. So many uses! You’ll love it!

Product: 304 Stainless Steel Kitchen Cooking Tongs, 9 and 12 Set of 2 Sturdy Grilling Barbeque Brushed Locking Food Tongs with Ergonomic Grip, Black
Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2024
Reviews: I absolutely love this set of tongs , they are the best tongs I have ever used. They are sturdy , you can tell they are quality made , they grasp the object (food) great , are easy to hold with the super grip handles , love the color red which I ordered and the locking design is great. It's like I thought all tongs were the same , I was so wrong these are so much better than my old ones that I had for like 100 yrs. ! Even my husband commented on these as he cooks on the grill, he stated that these have a great grip unlike our old ones and loves the locking mechanism which is so easy to use , a simple push and they are locked , snap and unlock how easy is that? They are easy to clean and you won't cut yourself as the tongs have more rounded edges not sharp but still have a great grasp at picking up any size or shape of foods , desserts, and great for grilling. I definitely recommend this set of 2 tongs because they are awesome and work great and SO well worth the low cost.

Product: 304 Stainless Steel Kitchen Cooking Tongs, 9 and 12 Set of 2 Sturdy Grilling Barbeque Brushed Locking Food Tongs with Ergonomic Grip, Black
Date: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2024
Reviews: These are replacing 2 Jamie Oliver tongs I got when I did a one-time live presentation of a set of his wonderful T-Fal pans about 15 years ago. They seem equally good as what I still can't throw away. The locking mechanism works well and that is what failed on the old ones. I do hope the new ones last as long. I really liked the choices of color grips; I got the turquoise set which is much more desirable than only having black as a choice. I like my automobiles in black. I wish they made a 3rd size which is smaller but was happy to find these. I use them indoors as well as on my Kamado grill outdoors. The best part was the price; very reasonable for today's inflated prices!
